tool_description: An API that helps you to retrive all the hindu temples in India. It's free to use and explore.
name: Hindu Temples API
title: Hindu Temples API

api_list.name: /list
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of Hindu temples. The response will include an array of temple objects, where each object contains details such as the temple name, location, district, state, country, address, description, architecture, and an image of the temple. Additionally, the response includes metadata related to pagination, providing information about the total number of temples, the number of temples per page, and the current page.
